title: Buff & Nerf
body:
Okay, so I recently got this idea and I thought I'd let everyone know :D
So, I don't know if this has already been thought of and denied by riot or if it's never even been imagined by anyone.

So, my idea was to replace the 'upvote' and 'downvote' button next to posts  with the letter 'B' and the letter 'N'.

B, for the upvote and N for the downvote. 
Now, I'm sure you're confused so let me spell it out, B would be like 'buff', you're 'buffing the post'. 
N, on the other hand would be like you're 'nerfing the post'.

Know what I mean? I think it could be a cool add on and wanted to hear what everyone thinks. 

So, please, 'buff' this post if you agree, and, 'nerf' it if you disagree!

replies.body: go away, you cant buff text
